```{r}
library(friends)
library(tidyverse)

friends |>
  group_by(speaker) |>
  summarize(count = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(count))
```

```{r}
questions <- friends |>
    select(text, speaker) |>
    filter(str_detect(speaker, "Rachel Green|Monica Geller|Phoebe Buffay|Joey Tribbiani$|Chandler Bing|Ross Geller")) |>
    filter(str_detect(text, "\\?")) |>
    group_by(speaker) |>
    summarize(num_questions = n())
  

questions
```

Who asks the most questions?
